raw_comment: I notice that clean methods of energy generation consistently yield more energy production than fossil fuels do for all fuel types. I wonder why China has a much steeper graph for energy production than the United States does. This relates to my community as we can continue to produce more clean energy-generation techniques that produce more and more energy and are more and more efficient. Headline: "Fossil Fuels; A Thing Of The Past"
